markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Devil](/Traits.aspx?ID=44)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 630 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A family of [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) from [Hell](/Planes.aspx?ID=18), most devils are irredeemably lawful evil. They typically have [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), immunity to fire, and [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37).
name: Devil
